activities: The information received by Yamaha Music Interactive, Inc. ("Applicant") is information collected from customers or potential customers of the Applicant and Applicant's parent company, Yamaha Corporation, and its affiliates as well as other business partners.  We use the information to allow customers to purchase products and for order fulfillment purposes.  We also use the information, among other things, to communicate with customers about orders, products, services, and promotional offers.  In addition, use of the information permits customers to utilize Yamaha-related websites, including, but not limited to, updating records, customer account maintenance, display content, and recommended products and services that may be of interest to customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: An individual may seek resolution of a privacy issue through the TRUSTe online third party dispute resolution program.  If an individual is not satisfied with the resolution provided by TRUSTe, such individual shall file a request for mediation of the privacy issue with the American Arbitration Association at 335 Madison Avenue, Floor 10, New York, New York 10017-4605, Phone: 212-716-5800 Fax: 212-716-5905; or Websitemail@adr.org.
